title: Hannah Cooper
summary: Hannah Cooper (born 10 June 1979) is a Liberian hurdler. She competed in the women's 100 metres hurdles at the 2000 Summer Olympics.
content:
Hannah Cooper (born 10 June 1979) is a Liberian hurdler. She competed in the women's 100 metres hurdles at the 2000 Summer Olympics.
